snippet: The Transportation Department said Thursday that 86.5 percent of flights on the leading carriers arrived on time in September, the fourth best month in the 21 years of comparable records.
abstract: Transportation Dept says 86.5 percent of flights on biggest carriers arrived on time in September, up from 80.3 percent in August, in what is fourth best month in 21 years of comparable records.
lead_paragraph: The Transportation Department said Thursday that 86.5 percent of flights on the leading carriers arrived on time in September, the fourth best month in the 21 years of comparable records.

headline.print_headline: Airlines’ On-Time Flights Rose Sharply in September
headline.main: Airlines’ On-Time Flights Rose Sharply in September
